title: Critical materials: Researchers eye huge supply of rare-earth elements from mining waste

title_detail.value: Critical materials: Researchers eye huge supply of rare-earth elements from mining waste

summary: Researchers have examined a method to extract rare-earth elements from mining waste that could provide the world with a reliable supply of the valuable materials.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have examined a method to extract rare-earth elements from mining waste that could provide the world with a reliable supply of the valuable materials.
